mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, user_pwd, name, phone, email, birth, address, user_stat, join_date, user_mod_date, gender, points, rating) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{user_pwd}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{address}, #{user_stat}, #{join_date}, #{user_mod_date}, #{gender}, #{points}, #{rating});
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, name, phone, email, birth, address, gender FROM user WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_pwd = #{user_pwd}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, birth = #{birth}, address = #{address}, user_mod_date = now() WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_id=#{user_id} AND user_pwd=#{user_pwd};
